website_summaries.verdict: Nexxus Hydra-Light Weightless Moisture Shampoo is crafted with proteins extracted from nature's most best ingredients to treat your oily hair without weighing it down.
pros: This shampoo is a super lightweight formula enriched with deep sea minerals, designed to inject moisture into your hair
Helps provide fullness and body to your hair
Contains a hydrating polymer to condition and strengthen hair
cons: While many had great results with this shampoo, it doesn't work for everyone's hair type

customer_reviews.title: The best light-weight conditioner!!
customer_reviews.text: I have combination hair- dry from coloring damage but oily at the roots- and this is my new favorite conditioner! It conditions and moisturizes my hair without making it feel heavy and lifeless. LOVE this conditioner so much, I just ordered the shampoo too :-)
customer_reviews.author: Nic0418

customer_reviews.title: Authentic and great
customer_reviews.text: This product is authentic, smells exactly like it’s supposed to and works great like it always does! Makes your hair shiny and your scalp healthy looking. Doesn’t leave a residue on the scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, best I found for my hair
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t take much the shampoo or the conditioner For thin curly hair it’s perfect not heavy or weighing down . Defines curl and very little friz. Hair is silky soft. Scent , I feel is very pleasant not strong.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't weight hair down
customer_reviews.text: Hair feels moisturized but has height at the roots. Will not weigh down your hair even by the end of the day. The smell is great. Clean and not flowery. This shampoo seems to work just as well with any Nexxus conditioner variety.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Bottles arrived open
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, but all three bottles of shampoo arrived with the kids half unscrewed and shampoo all over the inside of the box. No options for return or exchange. I’d have given 5 stars if the product had arrived intact.

customer_reviews.title: Nexxus does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy as a new customer to the Nexxus products. I would purchase, again. Leave my hair soft, bright, shiny and the scent is light! Really great!

product_meta.title: Nexxus Hydra-Light Weightless Moisture Shampoo Shampoo for Normal to Oily Hair Replenishing Silicone free 13.5 oz
product_meta.description:
Born in salons and perfected by science, each Nexxus system is crafted with proteins extracted from nature’s most precious ingredients. Nexxus uses advanced scientific methods to identify the protein needs of hair, and we create highly effective custom formulas. Do you find it hard to treat your hair without weighing it down? Background humidity and daily aggressors can leave hair in need of nourishment, but oily hair needs a delicate touch. Nexxus Hydra-Light Weightless Moisture products are salon crafted to give hair the luscious body it deserves. Use this shampoo to inject moisture into your hair without weighing it down. Enriched with Deep Sea Minerals, this shampoo has a lightweight formula that gives hair effortless movement. Nexxus recommends: Use this shampoo for normal to oily hair to inject body and buoyancy into your hair as Step 1 in the Nexxus Weightless Moisture Collection. Step 1: Apply Nexxus Hydra-Light Shampoo to wet hair and experience the delicate lather. Rinse thoroughly. Step 2: Use Hydra-Light Conditioner to hydrate hair without weighing it down. Smooth and press into freshly washed hair, wait a few minutes, then rinse out. Step 3: Try Hydra-Light Root Lift Mist or Leave-In Conditioning Foam. Use your preferred certified salon hair product before or after drying hair for a weightlessly nourished style.
